scripts.predocker:load: docker exec sw_db mariadb -uroot -proot -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS watch"
scripts.docker:load: docker exec -i sw_db mariadb -uroot -proot watch < schema.sql
scripts.clean: docker rm -f sw_db sw_phpmyadmin ; docker rmi -f mariadb phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin ; docker volume rm server_sw_data
